source_item.name: Greater Rune of the Void Ritual

effects.display_string: Set: Your healing spells have a chance to apply Insurance! to their targets that heals them for 660,502 over 15 sec. Insurance! is consumed if an ally drops below 40% health to heal them for 265,837.
Set: Divine Toll applies Insurance! to allies it heals for 8 sec. Divine Toll's cooldown is reduced by 1.0 sec each time you spend Holy Power.

sockets.display_string: +181 Primary Stat and +1% Maximum Mana per unique Algari gem color

spells.description: Equip: Receiving direct healing from allies has a high chance to restore 3,125 mana to your ally and grant you both 403 Versatility for 10 sec.

(4) Set: Holy Shock increases the initial healing of your next Word of Glory or Light of Dawn by 8%, stacking up to 4 times.

name: The Jastor Diamond

spells.description: Equip: Take Credit for your allies' deeds up to once every 12 sec, gaining 79 of their highest secondary stat up to 10 times until shortly after leaving combat. You have a 10% chance to get caught in the act, transferring all accumulated Credit to your ally for 15 sec instead.

description: I'm not gonna give you a detailed receipt of all the businesses I took over, started, sold, or destroyed. I won: that's all. I won everything I wanted.

name: Cyrce's Circlet
description: Sea dogs and tale spinners tell stories of a mythical siren that could lure even the stubbornest sailors to a watery grave.

spells.description: Equip: Your abilities have a chance to call an earthen ally to your aid, supporting you in combat.

Equip: Your healing spells and abilities have a chance to summon Mister Pick-Me-Up for 6 sec, firing a healing beam every 2 sec that jumps between 5 injured allies to restore 93,982 health each.

Overhealing from this effect irradiates allies to deal Nature damage to nearby enemies over 1.5 sec, increased by additional overhealing.

Equip: Taking damage greater than 25% of your health grants you 2,602 Avoidance and increases healing taken by 10% for 10 sec. This effect may only occur every 90 sec.

Falling damage reduced.

Equip: Gain Ascendance every 8 seconds spent in combat.

Ascendance grants 89 of a random secondary stat for 15 sec, stacking up to 10 times.

This is a Nerubian embellishment.

spells.description: Equip: Embrace the darkness. Double the effects of your other Nerubian embellished item, positive and negative.
